verbs.description: [ARG1: The Mexican peso] [V: slumped] [ARGM-ADV: against the dollar] [ARGM-TMP: Thursday] [ARGM-TMP: following reports that President Donald Trump is set to move forward with steel and aluminum tariffs on Mexico , Canada and the European Union as soon as the end of the week] .

The Mexican peso slumped against the dollar Thursday [V: following] [ARG2: reports that President Donald Trump is set to move forward with steel and aluminum tariffs on Mexico , Canada and the European Union as soon as the end of the week] .

The Mexican peso slumped against the dollar Thursday following reports that President Donald Trump [V: is] set to move forward with steel and aluminum tariffs on Mexico , Canada and the European Union as soon as the end of the week .

The Mexican peso slumped against the dollar Thursday following reports that [ARG1: President Donald Trump] is [V: set] [ARG2: to move forward with steel and aluminum tariffs on Mexico , Canada and the European Union as soon as the end of the week] .
